import React, { Component } from "react"; import "./Profile.scss"; import profile from "../../../Assets/image/profile.jpg"; import { connect } from "react-redux"; import DropzoneComponent from "react-dropzone-component"; // import { setUserData } from "../../../Actions"; import { Dialog } from "@material-ui/core"; import DialogTitle from "@material-ui/core/DialogTitle"; import Dropzone from "../../ReusableComponents/Dropzone/Dropzone"; class Profile extends Component { state = { openDialogBox: false, backgroundImage: "", }; handleClickOpen = () => { this.setState({ openDialogBox: true, }); }; handleClose = () => { this.setState({ openDialogBox: false, }); }; handleFileUpload = (file, id) => { this.setState({ [id]: file, isDisabled: false, }); }; render() { const { openDialogBox, backgroundImage } = this.state; return (

Profile Details

(this.backgroundImage = ref)} id="backgroundImage" addFile={this.handleFileUpload} imageUrl={backgroundImage} removeFile={this.handleRemoveFile} isEdit={true} />
Change Password
); } } const MapStateToProps = (state) => ({ profileData: state.auth.userData, }); export default connect(MapStateToProps)(Profile);
